strings.string: The chosen device ID retrieved from your device access project. Make sure you identify the device ID of your Nest Thermostat.
Filled in by in App selection.
OAuth2 Authorisation Code for your Google Nest SDM API project.
OAuth2 Authorisation Access Token for your Google Nest SDM API project. Derived from OAuth Code and lasts 1 hour.
A UTC time value for when the access token expires.
OAuth2 Authorisation Refresh Token for your Google Nest SDM API project. Used to refresh the access token once it has expired.
